column1: Conservation of Contemporary Art and Media MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis exciting two-year MSc offers a unique opportunity to undertake vocational training in the conservation of contemporary sculpture, installation, time-based media works of art and design including conceptual, digital, socially engaged, performance-based and mixed media works. Whilst ensuring that students are engaged with the key debates around the conservation and stewardship of contemporary art and design, the programme is fundamentally grounded in hands-on training for real-world situations.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 2 years full time, 4 years part time
